text: warthamanaya wana wita wiwidha sewa samupakara samithi boho durata rajaye wyawasayan bawata path wi thibe.
“mokak me pandara..
wadi digu kalina sithima, piyawara wiwidha aakaraye akhanda wardhanayak digu kalina balaporoththu nawatha hada ganwime di athyawashya karyabharayak itu karayi.
handa kiyanne dewiyek.
nathinam dutugamunu gath kaduwa marwin silwata ganna wenawa.
mema lipiye awadharanaya pilibandawa kumaraswami dakwanne,
kadima thanuwak, kadima sangithaya...
hitapu niyojya kathanayaka thilanga sumathipala mahathata thawaduratath krikat sabhapathidhuraye katayuthu...
bandhanagarayata giyama sallikarayan, deshapalanagnyayan bandhanagaraye rohale gatha wi sapa windinawa.
ape loku amma kenekuth inna hinda mata loku shakthiyak ....

kolambaadi pawathi madhya hamuwakadi ohu prakasha kale, mathdrawya jawaramkaruwan siyalu dena pasugiya janadhipathiwaranayedi dinana bawa sithagena siti ek apekshakayeku wenuwen mudal waya kala bawa ya.
eketh godak wenas kam kala.
eyala kasada bandala awurudu 23k lu.

dahathun denakugen sadum lath gewal bindinniyan kandayamak ‘kawi nagarhi’ mudranalayakata athul wi chayarupa mudranayata yoda ganu labana aluminiyam thahadu pansiyak sorakam kara athi bawa ‘uththar pradesh’ pranthayen wartha weyi.
jon kils labha siyayata 35 kin nagi amathi champika thawath
wenath dewal sandaha koti gananin mudal waya karanna samaharunta puluwan.
ayi enna uthsahayakwath noganne.
apage pawulwala miyagiya.
eya prathama warata 1955 pawathwu nawika hamuda sanwathsarayedi osawanu labiya.
gotata,sajithta dinanna ba....
apa amathyanshaya yatathe pawathina wiwidha sewa sapayana aayathana dijital thakshanayata pathkirima sandaha me wanawitath piyawara gena thibe.
eeka kiyannama wenawa pradhana kathawata kalin.
” gaja kum bindina kesarindu ” kiya sahithya kathawala eyi.
mema chithrapataye kathawa lankawata anurupa wana lesa premaranjith idiripath kara thibini.
adath wenne me demayi...
dewanuwa kawaraya nirmanaya kirima sandaha mata purwa nidahasa awashyayi.
madhya thulin wiwidha de pracharaya wanawa.
kiyala mata hithuna mage puthe...
aaye wadata enawa.
aya thama nama dewinda disanayaka namin wenas karagena siti athara wiwahaya sandaha thoragath kenage nama buddhima wiya.
madagath nihandathawa digin digatama adi giyeya.
oya dannawada kawuda eyawa maruwe kiyala?
ehenam ithin wena sastharayak anugamanaya karanta weyi

esema rata abhyantharaye dambaulla, mahanuwara ha nuwaraeliya yana nagarawalath, mathale saha mawanalla yana pradeshawala thibena wideshiya sancharakayan sandaha pamanak wen wunu “kulubadu udyana”walath mewanno sitithi.
sirisena mahatha ohuge porondu amathakakara damuwa; ohu pawadunna.

tharuna gayakayo ada kshethraya thula boho innawa?
" inna,mama me bag eka ayiyage kamaren thiyanna......"
methanadi ishanige waraya elambaini.
biwwata biwwe na wage..
sobani gedara gena aa pasu aya jiwath kala yuthu wiya.
ethakota owun apahasuwata path wenawa.
jiwathwa sitiyadi ethumata harihati agayimak labunadayi mama nodanimi.
pasuwa danagannata labuna paridi ..
ayi ban umbaa dan noliyanne...
ee sathuta deguna theguna wanne aduma pahasukam thiyeddi mehema dinumak labimayi.
pasugiya sapthambar masaye pawathi maha mathiwaranaye di kisidu deshapalana pakshayakata bahuthara balayak himi nowu athara, lebar pakshaya deweni sthanayata pathwiya.
widya kiyanneth raj wagema duppath kenek. ...
ada sikurada dum kola samagama wisin kolambaa pradarshana ha sammelana madhyasthanaye pawathwu wadasatahanakata jathika sangha sammelanaye wirodhaya pala wiya.
maithrige parsanaliti prashnaya mita kalin kiwama oba kiwe eya upathinma aa yuthu bawath, ohu saralakama waradak lesa nodakina lesath wani deyaki.
“oyage yaluwa diwi nasagaththa kiwata mata hithenne me samajaya eyawa amu amuwe maruwa kiyalayi nangiye...”

china komiyunist paksha nayakathwaya yatathe chinaya elambaena nawa yugaye wadi wishala wardhanayak ha nawa prathipala laba ganima lokaya balaporoththu wana bawa irana islam samuhanduwe prawruththi sewaya wartha kara thibe.

me aathmenam ithin inne yuropene ee handa wenna athi..
ethumanange leya wagurawamin, ethumanangema jiwithaya pujakaramin midime milaya lesa gewana ladi.
eya aayojakayek wenda puluwani.
kawitha yanu usas adhyapana amathyanshaya wisin, sarasawi sisunge nirmana – kusalatha agayanu was; sanwidhana karana lada sammana ulelaki.

wathman nithi asamath wana wyapara sandaha athi wikalpa kihipayen ekak wanne bankolothbhawaya aaraksha kirima sandaha gonu kirimayi.
ara gollo "

1991 desambarayedi dakunu aasiyanu krida ulela shri lankawe, kolambaa nagarayedi pawathwini.[1]

swadhina chinthanayak, jathika prathipaththiyak na. pi. bi. kumara mahatha wisthara kaleya. 2015 maha kannayedi me ratata wasara deka thunakata athiwenna gowingen wi labuna. 2015 pawathi mathiwaranaya balagena me aya nosithu widiyata wi mila wadi kala.
ada kalayeth thaththwaya me wagemaya.
ridiwalata milak prakasha kala nokaka, boho karunu anuwa mila wenas we.
pakshaye lakuna lesa ‘ ginisiluwa ‘nam kara atha pakshaya liya padinchi kirima sandaha awashyi lekhana sarathfonseka mahatha wisin 29 da bhara denu labiya.
jathyanthara tharagawaliyakata kridakayan idiripath kirime di awadhanaya yomu kala yuthu isaw bohomayak athi bawa meyin pahadili we.
‘hari hari me manga poddak wil eka hitiya, dan yanna yanne’ ‘kadawathata yanna kol ekak dila badu ganna kena eyi’ me ayurin amathum 6kma ohuta ema ankayen aaweya.
panama wasiyo paththini maniyan, katharagama dewiyan menma aluth bandara dewiyan gana wishwasaya thabanno wethi.

alawathura ganegoda len wiharaya | janakatha ha ithihasaya kagalla - bulathkohupitiya maha margaye alawathura kadapila asalin hari tharamak dura giya wita hamuwana 250 kata aasanna piyagata sankhyawa nangi pasu me sithganna wiharaya hamuwe.dakunu indiyawe soli deshaye dhanya kataka pradeshaye kalak wasaya kala dharmakirthi nam lankika himi namak wisin me len wiharaya thanawana lada bawa kiyaweyi.ee himiyo me wiharaya pamanak nowa gadaladeniya saha lankathilaka wihara karmantha samagada sambandha bawa pahadiliya.ema wiharawala daknata labena gruha nirmana shilpa saha katayam kala lakshana ganegoda len wiharaye da daknata labe.

sudu ayiya ma waththan karagenama susana bhumiyata athul wiya.ohu kiyu kisiwak hariyata mata ahunadayi kiyawath mata ninaw natha.mama his balmen wata pita balimi.sohon bima pura aththe nihanda guptha bawaki.batahira ahasin hiru basa yannata aasannaya.ahaskusa purama aththe raktha warnayaki.ma waththan karagenama sohon koth atharin ehen mehen ringa gos anuhas ayiya ek thanaka nawathuni.ihalata gath husma pahalata danna mata amathaka wiya.maha handin handannata oona wida muwin ekama hadakwath pita nowiya.le panina tharamata thol waren wika mama haduma palanaya kalemi.sata sata ga gahena depa awasagawa mama ee sohona pamula ada watunemi.
